    We listen to your vision, assess your property, and identify opportunities

    ## Welcome We're an architect-engineer team specializing in smart home design and financial optimization. Whether you're looking to remodel your kitchen, add an ADU for rental income, or explore your property's potential through interactive dashboards, we combine thoughtful design with rigorous financial analysis. Every project starts with a simple question: *What if we could make this space more beautiful AND more valuable?* ### Why Work With Us? **Expert Design** ‚Äî Our architect brings professional design education and years of residential experience. **Financial Clarity** ‚Äî Our data engineer creates custom ROI models so you understand exactly how your investment performs. **Code Compliance** ‚Äî We handle permitting and regulatory requirements so you don't hit unexpected obstacles. **Client Focus** ‚Äî Your vision drives the process. We're here to enhance it, not replace it. Let's create something great together.
